銴銴銴

銴字的基本解释

銴
shì
车樘结。
铜锈。

銴
zhì
小车耳钩。
指器物系绳之处。

銴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》時制切，去祭，禪。］
(1)设在车两旁使不能进退的部件。
(2)铜锈。
[②]［zhì］
［《集韻》直例切，去祭，澄。］
(1)小车耳钩。
(2)指古代器物系绳之处。如河南新安铁门镇出土西汉墓葬中铁釜，呈尖底，圆腹，圆肩，直颈，腹部置銴。

銴字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銴； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第04
【唐韻】【集韻】?時制切，言誓。【說文】車樘結也。　又【說文】銅生五色也。　又【廣韻】以芮切【集韻】俞芮切，?音叡。又【集韻】蒲計切，音薜。又吉曳切，音瘈。義?同。　又【集韻】直例切，音滯。小車耳鉤。

銴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
銴字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
shì
Che Qiu knotted.
Patina.
Li
zhì
Trolley ear hooks.
Refers to the place where the artifact is tied.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" time cut, go to sacrifice, Zen. ]
(1) The components installed on both sides of the car so that it cannot be advanced or retreated.
(2) Copper rust.
[②]［zhì］
["Ji Yun" cut straight, go to sacrifice, clear. ]
(1) Trolley ear hooks.
(2) Refers to the place where ancient artifacts are tied. For example, the iron cauldron in the Western Han tomb unearthed in Tiemen Town, Xin'an, Henan, has a pointed bottom, round belly, round shoulders, straight neck, and abdomen.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銴; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1306 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Time to cut, swear. [Said the text] Che Zhaojie also.　[Said Wen] Copper is born with five colors.　[Guangyun] Yi Ruiqie [Jiyun] Yu Ruiqie,? Yin Rui. Also 【Jiyun】Puji cut, Yinxu. And Ji Yi cut, sound lamented. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Straight cut, sound lag. Trolley ear hooks.
Li
